altTitles.en: A Thousand Faces, A Thousand Blades.

description.en: The death criminals whom lived in the jail country, Palom are entering the “MAD GAME” in the progress. This is a battle for your freedom. What is the meaning of freedom ? Those that spill scum blood like a butcher massacring people, is there the flavor of freedom ? I swore before , I will use the legend sword in hand, breaking apart the shackles of this world !!

altTitles.en: くらいもり、しろいみち

description.en: In a small, lonely country town, a depressed young woman has a bittersweet encounter with a blind girl.

7 years have passed since the OZ gang was disbanded.  
The high school student Hoshino Eita is made to dress and work as a hostess called "Eira" at his family's establishment. While out in disguise, he encounters his classmate Miyabi Yamamoto. She inherited the banner of the OZ and "Eira" soon earns her trust.  
Now they're off to begin a new legend!

60 years after the Pacific War, on a certain midwinter island, was discovered the soldier Asahi Toshizou, buried in ice. Thanks to Matsumoto Kikuzou, his former subordinate and now the president of a large company, Asahi was resurrected to the present world, only to despair at the decay of today's japanese's youth.   
  
Not able to leave aside the Japan of today that his companions died for, he becomes a teacher to reform the students.

After being bullied at his old school, Makoto wants to be the main character of his own story. When he finds a bill with his face on it on a school trip to Kyoto, he takes it as a sign, which leads him to fall into a river. Once he comes to, he realizes that he has been transported back to the period of time in Japan known as the Bakumatsu!

Despite his short stature and his cowardly personality, Eisaku Yazawa dreams of one day becoming a gang leader of a nation of thugs. As he starts high school, he ends up meeting several delinquents who attend the same school as him.

title.en: The Red Ranger Becomes an Adventurer in Another World

altTitles.ja-ro: Sentai Red Isekai de Boukensha ni Naru

altTitles.ja: 戦隊レッド 異世界で冒険者になる

description.en: In the final battle against the evil Exterminators, Asagaki Tougo, a power ranger, traded his life for the enemy's. It seemed like everything was over, but suddenly he found himself in another world! He becomes an adventurer, transforming into Kizuna Red, and continues fighting to save people in trouble! Here he meets a young Wizard named Idola and his journey in this new world begins!

title.en: The Villainess Wants to Be a Sidekick (Promo)

description.en:
Why do they keep killing him off? What did he ever do wrong?  
  
A fan of the otome dating game <Arlandast Saga> finds that her ultimate bias, Lumins, ends up dead in every route but one.  
  
After completing all routes of the game, a mysterious voice asks for her wish. Furious and choked up, she shouts to save her ultimate bias and to give him a happy life.  
  
<Your wish has been received.>  
  
Waking up as Senephin, the villianess who harrasses the main character, she enjoys her dream where she could talk to Lumins, alive and well.   
  
That is, until, ‘Senephin’ realizes that her new self was not a dream.   
  
Senephin remembers that the only time Lumins survived his damned endings was when he ended up together with the female lead, Velkina. Realizing this, she makes it her utmost priority to get Lumins and Velkina together.   
  
But for some reason, Lumins seems more interested in Senephin than the original female lead. Will ‘Senephin’ be able to save Lumins?
